title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wu J, Pascovici D, Sullivan G, Rowell K (2023). APAFunctions: R functions used APAF code mass spectroscopy proteomics data analysis. R package version 0.1.0, https://apaf-bioinformatics.github.io/APAFunctions/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {APAFunctions: All R functions used in the APAF code for mass spectroscopy proteomics data analysis},   author = {Jemma Wu and Dana Pascovici and Geraldine Sullivan and Keiran Rowell},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://apaf-bioinformatics.github.io/APAFunctions/}, }

what: All R functions used in the APAF code for mass spectroscopy proteomics data analysis
title: All R functions used in the APAF code for mass spectroscopy proteomics data analysis
text: R package functions common APAF’s proteomics analysis code. Intended install_github(“APAF-bioinformatics/APAFunctions”)

what: Runs an ANOVA and returns Anova.adj and Anova.idx — ANOVA

text: Runs ANOVA returns Anova.adj Anova.idx

title: Runs an ANOVA and returns Anova.adj and Anova.idx — ANOVA
code: ANOVA(data, Group, FCcutoff, pvalcutoff)

what: Clustering method. If plot == TRUE, it plots using APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram() — HClust
title: Clustering method. If plot == TRUE, it plots using APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram() — HClust
text: Clustering method. plot == TRUE, plots using APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram()

title: Clustering method. If plot == TRUE, it plots using APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram() — HClust
code: HClust(   exp = c("SWATH", "TMT"),   data,   metric = c("euclidean", "manhattan", "pearsonCorrelation"),   scale = FALSE,   method = c("single", "complete", "average"),   basefile = "hclust",   glabel = row.names(data),   clabel = NULL,   cutNumber = NULL,   cutHeight = NULL,   plot = TRUE )

title: Clustering method. If plot == TRUE, it plots using APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram() — HClust
text: basefile base name type hclust method used: e.g. hclust-pearsonCorrelation-complete plot uses APAFunctions::plotColouredDendrogram(), defaults TRUE

title: Compute PCA, no plots — PCA_calc
text: Compute PCA, plots

title: Compute PCA, no plots — PCA_calc
code: PCA_calc(   exp = c("SWATH", "TMT"),   data,   scaleR = FALSE,   scaleC = TRUE,   k = min(dim(data)) - 2 )

title: Compute PCA, no plots — PCA_calc
text: exp experiment: either SWATH TMT data prot.ag dataframe. Long format intensity? data protein name first column. scaleR DETERMINED - leave FALSE GenePattern - manual row scaling? scaleC Pass scaling argument prcomp function PCA. Default TRUE. k Number components compute. Defaults number variables - 1.

title: Compute PCA, no plots — PCA_calc
text: components PCA labelled easy plotting

title: Generate 2D and 3D PCA plots — PCA_plot
text: Generate 2D 3D PCA plots

title: Generate 2D and 3D PCA plots — PCA_plot
code: PCA_plot(exp = c("SWATH", "TMT"), data, pca.components, Group)

title: Generate 2D and 3D PCA plots — PCA_plot
text: exp Currently TMT SWATH data Currently used TMT get rownames pca.components output PCA_calc() Group Group information column PCA_calc() input (usually prot.ag). replicate information.

what: An APAF wrapper for t.test() that works for both proteins and peptides — applyttest
title: An APAF wrapper for t.test() that works for both proteins and peptides — applyttest
text: APAF wrapper t.test() works proteins peptides

title: An APAF wrapper for t.test() that works for both proteins and peptides — applyttest
code: applyttest(   data,   Group,   PeporProt = c("Peptide", "Protein"),   doLogs = TRUE,   numerator = levels(Group)[1] )

title: An APAF wrapper for t.test() that works for both proteins and peptides — applyttest
text: data input matrix, subset either prot.ag pep.ag Group Group labels PeporProt Specify 'Protein' 'Peptide' depending type matrix used doLogs take log() matrix. Defaults TRUE numerator Group comparison, defaults levels(Group[1])

title: Plots a heatmap with either euclidean or cor distance; ANOVA or no ANOVA — plotHeatmaps

title: Set openxlsx style for comparisons and ANOVA table — printxlsxDataSheet
text: wb Keep workbook maintain styles data sheet added, needs loop FCcol Column index Fold Change values pvalcol Column index pvalues tabName Tab name, specify time avoid overwriting previous tabs hicutoff Default 1.5 lowcutoff Default 0.67 pvalcutoff Default 0.05
